programme.title: Silk Road
Wirtualne imperium
Silk Road
programme.desc:
Silk Road: Directed by Tiller Russell. With Nick Robinson, Jennifer Yun, Jimmi Simpson, Jason Clarke. Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7937254/","name":"Silk Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM0NzMyMjUtYTE0ZS00YWNhLWFjMTItZTAwYWJkOGI5MGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7937254/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fciocca"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"How such an interesting and fascinating story could be made so boring?","reviewBody":"What the director and screenwriters did not understood is that Silk Road was at the time a big revolution: drugs that were always bought with physical cash transactions, with all risks for being caught on the spot by the police, finally moved to the hidden web, guaranteeing anonymous purchases from all around the world and having them delivered directly at home. The market became so important, that the website started to sell also other kind of products, and this in a little over two years, which is impressive. Nothing of this is portrayed in the movie, which focuses too much on things that does not matter at all. Why giving so much attention to Ulbricht and his girlfriend? Why giving so much space to Bowden? Everything is rushed to a point where certain part of the story are completely skipped: how the founder passed to sell just drugs, to also weapons and fake documents? We don't get to know.

Ulbricht is portrayed just like a clueless guy, that does not have any idea on how to handle his activity, which maybe was partially true, but let me tell you that a guy that he is able to build from the ground up a marketplace so big and important, is not for sure dumb. In fact he finished university and he obtained even a master. Why you did not show the craft of the website? How he came up with the name Silk Road? How he grew his business, which strategies he used? None of this apparently matter on the eyes of creators. We see instead a DEA agent that was transferred to the cybercrimes department, because he completely suck at his job and need just to work a few months to get the pension. We see him hanging around with his informant, that does most of the job that he is supposed to do. Absolutely ridiculous. Moreover is the classic cop that he is not able to understand that time changes and the job is different now, so he is basically the typical boomer, not able to accept having a younger boss, more experienced than him in IT, and he claims that the old way is always the best one. So cliché.

If you really want to make a movie about Silk Road, you should first of all really inform yourself, reading books and watching documentaries about the topic, making tons of research; understanding how this single website changed society, which were the consequences when was shut down and what inspired afterwards. The movie is incomplete, and made by people that clearly did not know anything about it. Young, idealistic, and driven to succeed, Ross Ulbricht (Nick Robinson) creates the internet’s first unregulated marketplace: Silk Road. But when it becomes a multimillion-dollar pipeline for illicit drugs, Ross is set on a collision course with Rick Bowden (Jason Clarke), a disreputable and dangerously unpredictable DEA agent, who will use any means necessary to take him down."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3538718/","name":"Nick Robinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6066464/","name":"Jennifer Yun"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0801051/","name":"Jimmi Simpson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518293/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0243819/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731972/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6365846/","name":"David Kushner"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

Palmer), Alexandra Shipp (role=Julia), Katie Aselton (role=Sandy), Lexi Rabe (role=Edie), David DeLao (role=Johnny Morales)

IMDb data; ttnr: 7937254, Title: Silk Road, --- Description: Silk Road: Directed by Tiller Russell. With Nick Robinson, Jennifer Yun, Jimmi Simpson, Jason Clarke. Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7937254/","name":"Silk Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM0NzMyMjUtYTE0ZS00YWNhLWFjMTItZTAwYWJkOGI5MGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7937254/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"fciocca","dateCreated":"2021-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"How such an interesting and fascinating story could be made so boring?","reviewBody":"What the director and screenwriters did not understood is that Silk Road was at the time a big revolution: drugs that were always bought with physical cash transactions, with all risks for being caught on the spot by the police, finally moved to the hidden web, guaranteeing anonymous purchases from all around the world and having them delivered directly at home. The market became so important, that the website started to sell also other kind of products, and this in a little over two years, which is impressive. Nothing of this is portrayed in the movie, which focuses too much on things that does not matter at all. Why giving so much attention to Ulbricht and his girlfriend? Why giving so much space to Bowden? Everything is rushed to a point where certain part of the story are completely skipped: how the founder passed to sell just drugs, to also weapons and fake documents? We don't get to know.

Ulbricht is portrayed just like a clueless guy, that does not have any idea on how to handle his activity, which maybe was partially true, but let me tell you that a guy that he is able to build from the ground up a marketplace so big and important, is not for sure dumb. In fact he finished university and he obtained even a master. Why you did not show the craft of the website? How he came up with the name Silk Road? How he grew his business, which strategies he used? None of this apparently matter on the eyes of creators. We see instead a DEA agent that was transferred to the cybercrimes department, because he completely suck at his job and need just to work a few months to get the pension. We see him hanging around with his informant, that does most of the job that he is supposed to do. Absolutely ridiculous. Moreover is the classic cop that he is not able to understand that time changes and the job is different now, so he is basically the typical boomer, not able to accept having a younger boss, more experienced than him in IT, and he claims that the old way is always the best one. So cliché.

If you really want to make a movie about Silk Road, you should first of all really inform yourself, reading books and watching documentaries about the topic, making tons of research; understanding how this single website changed society, which were the consequences when was shut down and what inspired afterwards. The movie is incomplete, and made by people that clearly did not know anything about it. If you really want to know the true story, please go to watch "Deep Web", as it really explain what happened.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-02-19","keywords":"business,drugs,dark net","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi946258201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMzYzY1ZTQtZjc3Mi00MWU4LTg1NjQtYmFhMWE3MTIyNGU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMzYzY1ZTQtZjc3Mi00MWU4LTg1NjQtYmFhMWE3MTIyNGU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by larger-than-life actual events, this riveting crime thriller follows the rise and fall of Silk Road, the infamous darknet site that sent a seismic shock through the World Wide Web. Young, idealistic, and driven to succeed, Ross Ulbricht (Nick Robinson) creates the internet’s first unregulated marketplace: Silk Road. But when it becomes a multimillion-dollar pipeline for illicit drugs, Ross is set on a collision course with Rick Bowden (Jason Clarke), a disreputable and dangerously unpredictable DEA agent, who will use any means necessary to take him down.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3538718/","name":"Nick Robinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6066464/","name":"Jennifer Yun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0801051/","name":"Jimmi Simpson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518293/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0243819/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731972/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6365846/","name":"David Kushner"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Humans
Life
programme.desc:
Humans: With Katherine Parkinson, Gemma Chan, Lucy Carless, Tom Goodman-Hill. In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a 'Synth' - a highly-developed robotic servant that's so similar to a real human - is transforming the way we live." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4122068/","name":"Humans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NjE2OTY4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE0NDc0ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a 'Synth' - a highly-developed robotic servant that's so similar to a real human - is transforming the way we live.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4122068/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nicolasrowley"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Condition of Humans","reviewBody":"My wife and I operate a three episode policy when deciding to watch a new show. With all the great TV out there it can be hard to choose what to watch and not every show has a great start but develops into something memorable. As a result we always wait until we have DVR'd at least three episodes before watching the first. The other reason we record three is if the show is good we will want more immediately. Humans however left us wanting more after the third episode.

The concepts in this show are not ground breaking for any fan of the genre or any reader of science fiction but the fact it is set in the present day in a very relatable parallel reality (especially for Brits) is where this series gets its mojo. This is a thinking persons show the story is secondary to the compelling analysis of human nature and it's reactions to technology. Those who embrace it, those who reject it both are catered for here.

The production values are so very high and the casting is exemplary. Most people are not well known with the exception of William Hurt but there are familiar faces (again, especially for Brits) in there.

This show is not all action but is guaranteed to thrill you and chill you with it's moody pacing, moments of comedy and disturbing critique of humanity facing the very nature of its own creation.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37776,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-06-14","keywords":"based on tv series,female protagonist,british science fiction,robot,humanoid","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1817670/","name":"Katherine Parkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110418/","name":"Gemma Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6845331/","name":"Lucy Carless"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110977/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0318834/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 2 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2429007385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMzY2ODkxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI5MzE4MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMzY2ODkxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI5MzE4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a 'Synth' - a highly-developed robotic servant that's so similar to a real human it's transforming the way we live."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: W cotygodniowym programie zostają przedstawione najbardziej interesujące wydarzenia ze świata kina. Pojawiają się wywiady z osobami związanymi z branżą filmową, prowadzone są rozmowy na temat premier, nowości muzycznych i teatralnych.

programme.title: Zmruz oczy
Zmruż oczy
programme.desc: Zmruz oczy: Directed by Andrzej Jakimowski. With Zbigniew Zamachowski, Olga Prószynska, Rafal Guzniczak, Malgorzata Foremniak. The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0379063/","name":"Zmruz oczy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmZjNzhhNDYtMTg1YS00YWNjLTg0MjctNTY0Zjk1ZDEyZjk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0379063/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nicholas-salerno"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A philosophical comedy","reviewBody":"Squint Your Eyes (Zmruz oczy), Poland, 2003, d. Andrzej Jaminowski, 87 m. When Jasiak, a retired school teacher, decides to act as custodian of a deserted farm in the Polish countryside, he finds the easy life more than he bargained for. To begin with, the farm's owners neither want nor need a custodian. Then his solitude is broken by one of his former students, a young girl who's had it with her materialistic parents. And by some con artists, some cyclists, at least one self-proclaimed poet, the girl's parents, the farm's owners, and ultimately the police. So much for lazy-ing around in the hazy countryside. You might call Squint Your Eyes a provocative, philosophical comedy.Nick Salerno","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":891,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-10-24","keywords":"farm,ex teacher,rural setting,unemployment,isolation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1437136/","name":"Olga Prószynska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435653/","name":"Rafal Guzniczak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109608/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109606/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126437/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Najśmieszniejsze fragmenty z programów polskich stacji TV: gafy popełniane przez prezenterów, ich nietypowe zachowania przed kamerą oraz awarie techniczne powodujące absurdalne sytuacje.

programme.title: Kiler
Kiler
programme.desc: Kiler: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Jerzy Stuhr, Janusz Rewinski. An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0127626/","name":"Kiler","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNWMxYWEtODUwMC00ZDRjLWI0MmQtMjFjNTFiMDYwZDZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjExODE1MDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0127626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cjpok"},"dateCreated":"1999-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lots of action with funny twists","reviewBody":"This could easily be called the Polish version of "Pulp Fiction" but thank God, it is not. It is captivating from the very get-go, keeping the viewing audience as hostage to the very end. Although unique in style and approach, it is universal and could appeal to any audience, anywhere in the world. Humorous and tastefully prepared.No wonder Hollywood already bought rights to the story. We may see it on this side of the pond. I hope without Bruce Willis or other Hollywood screen "heroes". When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113986/","name":"Nine Months","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U3YTQzYWYtZTBlYi00ZmJjLTkzMjAtOTljYmE5MThhNzk5L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113986/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"venom_701"},"dateCreated":"2003-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Argument For Sterilization","reviewBody":""Nine Months" is a predictable chick flick, where a very happy, content bachelor knocks up his live-in girlfriend, thereby turning his world upside-down. Lessons learned: men who don't want to marry and have children are portrayed as immature, self-absorbed, selfish, and misguided. Carting lots of screaming kids around in a minivan is, apparently, the most fun a man can have in this lifetime. For women, having children is the ultimate achievement and fulfillment of their lives. This is an insulting fairy tale that women will love, because it shows men who don't want marriage and kids as BAD and men who do want marriage and kids as GOOD. Women are always GOOD no matter what their attitude or actions are."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1995-07-12","keywords":"time for title,bad dream,close up of eyes,close up of lips,close up of mouth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Nine Months","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2812084505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljYWMxZTUtNTQxYy00Yjc2LWI3MDEtYTNiYTQzMDZiMzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljYWMxZTUtNTQxYy00Yjc2LWI3MDEtYTNiYTQzMDZiMzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000424/","name":"Hugh Grant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000792/","name":"Tom Arnold"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0105317/","name":"Patrick Braoudé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Paper Towns
Papierowe miasta
Paper Towns
programme.desc:
Paper Towns: Directed by Jake Schreier. With Nat Wolff, Cara Delevingne, Austin Abrams, Justice Smith. After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3622592/","name":"Paper Towns","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2ODQxODMwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDY5NjY3NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3622592/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mr-ddesouza"},"dateCreated":"2015-12-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly surprised at how much I enjoyed watching this film!","reviewBody":"Is it worth the price of a rental? Yes.

I absolutely loved this movie! As 3 friends come to the end of their senior year. Quentin (played by Nat Wolff) sets out on an adventure likes he's never had before. There is very little that disappointed me in this film. As a matter of fact, my only real complaint was the character of Margo (played by Cara Delevingne), I can't quite put my finger on it but i found her character to be annoying throughout the first act. She was very monotone although she had this opinionated know it all attitude. 

However, since most of the film after that is about finding Margo, her character is not a problem anymore. I realize that the genre of the film is "Drama, Mystery, Romance", I think it is safe to add Adventure , Comedy to the mix. This film made good on the mystery of Margo while adding the adventure of the night before she goes missing along with the adventure that Quentin embarks throughout this entire film looking for Margo. I also found the movie to be very funny with best friends like Radar (played by Justice Smith) and Ben (played by Ben Abrams). These two have completely different characters from one another but together make for a great and funny friendship. Much comedic relief comes from the interaction of the two best friends alone and the scenes where it's all three of them.

I liked the cinematography in this film very much. There were pretty lens flares that I thought were suitable for this type of film and in the scenes that they used them. There was something about the slow motion car shots that I loved as well. A good use of shallow depth of field to concentrate on solely one character at times and no shots that were visually a distraction that I noticed.

I loved all the music that they put into the film. This was a definite plus for me.

Lastly, I love the message of this film. A young man graduating from high school with his whole future planned (college, marriage, kids, career) only to realize that life is more than just those things. That you can have an adventure through it all and that friends are so important and that you need to cherish friendships and enjoy them to the fullest before everyone goes their separate ways. This is a movie that I would recommend anyone watch. Live life to the fullest, have an adventure and don't let life pass you by. I am definitely planning on watching this film again in the near future. Hopefully I can better describe the feeling it gives me when I do.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98894,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-07-24","keywords":"based on novel,travel,teenage girl,unrequited love,friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2452795417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyNjAxNDc3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMxNDg4NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyNjAxNDc3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMxNDg4NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A coming-of-age story centering on Quentin and his enigmatic neighbor Margo, who loved mysteries so much she became one. After taking him on an all-night adventure through their hometown, Margo suddenly disappears - leaving behind cryptic clues for Quentin to decipher. The search leads Quentin and his quick-witted friends on an exhilarating adventure that is equal parts hilarious and moving. Ultimately, to track down Margo, Quentin must find a deeper understanding of true friendship - and true love."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1822659/","name":"Nat Wolff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5353321/","name":"Cara Delevingne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3641002/","name":"Austin Abrams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500577/","name":"Jake Schreier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2354099/","name":"Scott Neustadter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2352210/","name":"Michael H. Weber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1981261/","name":"John Green"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3622592, Title: Paper Towns, --- Description: Paper Towns: Directed by Jake Schreier. With Nat Wolff, Cara Delevingne, Austin Abrams, Justice Smith. After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3622592/","name":"Paper Towns","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2ODQxODMwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDY5NjY3NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3622592/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mr-ddesouza","dateCreated":"2015-12-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly surprised at how much I enjoyed watching this film!","reviewBody":"Is it worth the price of a rental? Yes.

I absolutely loved this movie! As 3 friends come to the end of their senior year. Quentin (played by Nat Wolff) sets out on an adventure likes he's never had before. There is very little that disappointed me in this film. As a matter of fact, my only real complaint was the character of Margo (played by Cara Delevingne), I can't quite put my finger on it but i found her character to be annoying throughout the first act. She was very monotone although she had this opinionated know it all attitude. 

However, since most of the film after that is about finding Margo, her character is not a problem anymore. I realize that the genre of the film is "Drama, Mystery, Romance", I think it is safe to add Adventure , Comedy to the mix. This film made good on the mystery of Margo while adding the adventure of the night before she goes missing along with the adventure that Quentin embarks throughout this entire film looking for Margo. I also found the movie to be very funny with best friends like Radar (played by Justice Smith) and Ben (played by Ben Abrams). These two have completely different characters from one another but together make for a great and funny friendship. Much comedic relief comes from the interaction of the two best friends alone and the scenes where it's all three of them.

I liked the cinematography in this film very much. There were pretty lens flares that I thought were suitable for this type of film and in the scenes that they used them. There was something about the slow motion car shots that I loved as well. A good use of shallow depth of field to concentrate on solely one character at times and no shots that were visually a distraction that I noticed.

I loved all the music that they put into the film. This was a definite plus for me.

Lastly, I love the message of this film. A young man graduating from high school with his whole future planned (college, marriage, kids, career) only to realize that life is more than just those things. That you can have an adventure through it all and that friends are so important and that you need to cherish friendships and enjoy them to the fullest before everyone goes their separate ways. This is a movie that I would recommend anyone watch. Live life to the fullest, have an adventure and don't let life pass you by. I am definitely planning on watching this film again in the near future. programme.desc: Rok 1939. Pisarz Tadeusz Dołęga-Mostowicz (Patryk Szwichtenberg) podróżuje po Polsce ze swoją asystentką Dianą (Agata Różycka). Melchiora Wańkowicza (Marek Karpowicz), Janusza Kusocińskiego, Eugeniusza Kwiatkowskiego i Hankę Ordonównę.

programme.title: Time Freak
Zakochany geniusz
Time Freak
programme.desc:
Time Freak: Directed by Andrew Bowler. With Asa Butterfield, Sophie Turner, Skyler Gisondo, Will Peltz. A genius teenage boy is in love with a girl who breaks up after a year. He invents a time-machine and tries to fix the break-up repeatedly. He finally goes a year back with his friend/advisor to fix the bad days." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6769280/","name":"Time Freak","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzhmMzI5MDItODg2My00M2IxLTgxMGItNTZkYWIxNWVkMDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg4MDYyNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A genius teenage boy is in love with a girl who breaks up after a year. He invents a time-machine and tries to fix the break-up repeatedly. He finally goes a year back with his friend/advisor to fix the bad days.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6769280/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thekarmicnomad"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More heart than mind - not much Sci-Fi to see here.","reviewBody":"A boy-genius meets the love of his life. A few months later they have split up - cue the time machine to get her back.

At first glance I knew I had definitely been here before - but I was wrong.

On the surface you can enjoy this as a very simple, quaint romance with the odd joke thrown in.

The sci-fi element of this is kept on the down low. There are no annoying sequences about paradoxes, dichotomies or accidentally shagging your own parents here. This is all about the relationships of the three main characters and the choices we make in life.

Straight away the leads do not look like they are an actual couple and I assumed their chemistry would be garbage.

This, however, is one of the strengths of the film and what sets it apart.

This will really resonate with anyone who (like me) has gone out with someone who is clearly hotter and more vivacious than themselves. There was something painfully familiar seeing the lead character snowballing trivial disagreements in to major issues due to a lack-of-confidence, fear and jealousy. Then of course the harder he tries to fix things the more damage he causes.

The characters are great in this; they are so believable they almost feel like people from my actual past. The story is simple but non-judgmental - I found myself rooting for all parties involved all the time.

Despite having some depth this remains a nice light watch, there is no nudity, violence, political agendas, and it won't stretch your brains or emotions too far either.

An excellent watch!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8128,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-11-07","keywords":"based on short film,time travel,young love,coming of age,teenage boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3467622937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI3NzU4NDQtM2RkZC00ZGY1LWJhOTgtNThmZjBkZGM2NWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI3NzU4NDQtM2RkZC00ZGY1LWJhOTgtNThmZjBkZGM2NWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Physics prodigy Stillman (Butterfield) is destined for great things, only to be derailed when his girlfriend, Debbie (Turner) suddenly dumps him. But Stillman isn't beaten, he does what any heartbroken genius would do - he invents a time machine to get a second chance at love."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2633535/","name":"Asa Butterfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3849842/","name":"Sophie Turner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1711114/","name":"Skyler Gisondo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1577772/","name":"Andrew Bowler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0555595/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0564574/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0636796/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1577772/","name":"Andrew Bowler"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

Kiler
programme.desc: Kiler: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Jerzy Stuhr, Janusz Rewinski. An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0127626/","name":"Kiler","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNWMxYWEtODUwMC00ZDRjLWI0MmQtMjFjNTFiMDYwZDZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjExODE1MDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0127626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cjpok"},"dateCreated":"1999-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lots of action with funny twists","reviewBody":"This could easily be called the Polish version of "Pulp Fiction" but thank God, it is not. It is captivating from the very get-go, keeping the viewing audience as hostage to the very end. Although unique in style and approach, it is universal and could appeal to any audience, anywhere in the world. programme.title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa
Kochankowie roku tygrysa
programme.desc:
Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Michal Zebrowski (role=Wolski), Li Min (role=Song), Sun Ji Feng (role=Guo), Wu Fen Xia (role=Guo Da Ma), Norbert Rakowski (role=Stankiewicz), Irena Slawinska (role=Old Woman from the Village)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0484051, Title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa, --- Description: Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. programme.title: Z odzysku
Z odzysku
programme.desc:
Z odzysku: Directed by Slawomir Fabicki. With Antoni Pawlicki, Nataliya Vdovina, Jacek Braciak, Dimitri Melnichuk. 19 year old Wojtek lives in a poverty stricken Polish town. He is in love with an older woman, an illegal emigrant from Ukraine. He boxes in illegal matches to get money and is spotted by a man running a security business. Accepting this man's offer means becoming a gangster, but this could allow him to a residence permit for his girlfriend Katya." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0800275/","name":"Z odzysku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAwYmI3NGMtZTJhOS00NDQ4LWIwN2EtZjFmYjA4ODQ0MDg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"19 year old Wojtek lives in a poverty stricken Polish town. He is in love with an older woman, an illegal emigrant from Ukraine. He boxes in illegal matches to get money and is spotted by a man running a security business. Accepting ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0800275/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sclerozo"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Weak and shallow plot and result is a dismal movie","reviewBody":"I was unlucky to see this movie at the Toronto International Film Festival and now by chance I came across it on IDMB. I was hoping it might have been a movie I missed and after realizing what it is I decided to post my comment.

I can't believe how this pathetic movie garnered some awards as it appears to have. The plot is banal and approaches stupid as the unconvincing downfall of this man is portrayed. Somehow the director tries to portray that hard work will get you nowhere in post-communist Poland and the attachment with a gang lifestyle also leads to a calamity. The ending is so abrupt and unexpected that it leaves the audience wondering whether the film reel missed a splicing. 

I would like to watch a Polish movie worthy of the time to see it and this one falls so far behind that and I truly regret the wasted time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-17","keywords":"fall from height,accident,kissing,male female relationship,marriage proposal","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2252397/","name":"Antoni Pawlicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891502/","name":"Nataliya Vdovina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102765/","name":"Jacek Braciak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264614/","name":"Slawomir Fabicki"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147152/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264614/","name":"Slawomir Fabicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367885/","name":"Denijal Hasanovic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2256587/","name":"Marek Pruchniewski"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lifting wnętrz z Marią Semczyszyn
programme.desc: Maria Semczyszyn wraz ze swym kompanem, Wieśkiem, pomaga w błyskawicznym re-designie pokojów, których obecny wygląd z różnych powodów nie zadowala właścicieli. Zadanie nie należy do łatwych - to właściciele decydują, w jakim stylu mają być urządzone pomieszczenia. Dekoratorka musi sprostać ich oczekiwaniom, niejednokrotnie przedstawiając projekty, które kłócą się z jej własnym gustem.

programme.title: THE LEGENDS z Tomkiem Ćwiąkałą
programme.desc: Cykl wywiadów przeprowadzanych przez Tomka Ćwiąkałę z ważnymi postaciami ze świata futbolu. Wśród nich są mistrzowie świata, Europy i gwiazdy topowych lig. Widzowie dowiedzą się, czym zajmują się dzisiaj, jak wspominają swoje kariery oraz poznają ich plany na przyszłość.

programme.title: Zielona rewolucja Marty Dymek 2
programme.desc: Marta Dymek przeprowadza w kuchni rewolucję. Przekonuje mięsożerców do potraw wegańskich. Wśród jej gości znajdą się złoty medalista z Pekinu Piotr Małachowski i kucharki z baru mlecznego.

programme.title: ABC gotowania - kuchnia włoska
programme.desc: Sztuka kulinarna we Włoszech opiera się na prostych potrawach przygotowanych z dobrych składników. Oliwa z oliwek, warzywa i zioła, sery, ryby, owoce morza, jajka, mąka i oliwki to podstawy wielu dań.

programme.title: Jakubiak rodzinnie
programme.desc: Gotowanie jest znakomitym pretekstem do spędzania czasu z rodziną. Znany szef kuchni Tomasz Jakubiak zachęca do dzielenia się z bliskimi pysznymi daniami. Sam w programie przedstawi członków swojej rodziny: mamę, tatę, siostrę oraz narzeczoną. Wraz z nimi w każdym odcinku zaprezentuje proste pomysły na śniadanie, obiad i kolację. Nie zabraknie anegdot z życia kucharza oraz cennych wskazówek kulinarnych.

programme.title: Meblokreacje 5
programme.desc: Artur Indyka podejmuje się ciekawych wyzwań. Przedstawia świeże pomysły na stare meble i dodatki do wnętrz. Pozornie bezużyteczne przedmioty zyskują drugie życie i nowe funkcje. Ekspert zajmuje się m.in. starymi skrzyniami wojskowymi, z których powstaje designerski regał pod RTV czy dziecięcym łóżkiem, przerobionym na serwantkę. Nie brakuje też rozwiązań w duchu "zero waste", takich jak wykorzystanie plastikowych słomek jako tworzywa do ramy lustra.

programme.title: Meblokreacje 5
programme.desc: Artur Indyka podejmuje się ciekawych wyzwań. Przedstawia świeże pomysły na stare meble i dodatki do wnętrz. Pozornie bezużyteczne przedmioty zyskują drugie życie i nowe funkcje. Ekspert zajmuje się m.in. starymi skrzyniami wojskowymi, z których powstaje designerski regał pod RTV czy dziecięcym łóżkiem, przerobionym na serwantkę. Nie brakuje też rozwiązań w duchu "zero waste", takich jak wykorzystanie plastikowych słomek jako tworzywa do ramy lustra.

programme.title: Pogotowie remontowe Wieśka 4
programme.desc: Wiesiek Skiba pomaga ludziom, którzy stali się ofiarami nierzetelnych firm remontowych. Specjalista naprawi rozmaite usterki zgłoszone przez widzów. Udowodni też, że wiele drobnych remontów w kuchni, łazience, salonie czy na tarasie można zrobić samodzielnie.

programme.title: Remont w 48h

programme.title: Lifting wnętrz z Marią Semczyszyn
programme.desc: Maria Semczyszyn wraz ze swym kompanem, Wieśkiem, pomaga w błyskawicznym re-designie pokojów, których obecny wygląd z różnych powodów nie zadowala właścicieli. Zadanie nie należy do łatwych - to właściciele decydują, w jakim stylu mają być urządzone pomieszczenia. Dekoratorka musi sprostać ich oczekiwaniom, niejednokrotnie przedstawiając projekty, które kłócą się z jej własnym gustem.

programme.desc: Stealing Harvard: Directed by Bruce McCulloch. With Jason Lee, Tom Green, Leslie Mann, Megan Mullally. A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0265808/","name":"Stealing Harvard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZhMGIyNGMtN2NmYy00OTBhLWE3NWQtMGQ3ZmNmZGUwMDg1L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0265808/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"a silly comedy that works","reviewBody":"Call me crazy, but I liked this movie. It had its moments. I especially liked Elaine's dad; his character was the funniest. The part where John and Mr. Warner end up in drag at the judge's house was so funny. Then the end was great when John writes I have the picture, and the judge lets him off. And all the silly ideas John and Duff come up with to get the money were quite entertaining. I liked the fact that for once, Tom Green didn't play a gross out character.\n\nFINAL VERDICT: This is a comedy worth seeing. It's only about 80 minutes long, but that's about right for a Tom Green movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2002-09-13","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,harvard,black comedy,crying during sex,voice over narration","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stealing Harvard","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4237989913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Stealing Harvard"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005134/","name":"Jason Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338381/","name":"Tom Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005182/","name":"Leslie Mann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567126/","name":"Bruce McCulloch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405271/","name":"Martin Hynes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865847/","name":"Peter Tolan"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Trzy i pół godziny
programme.desc: Monachium, 13 sierpnia 1961 roku. Pasażerowie pociągu do Berlina Wschodniego dowiadują się o budowie muru dzielącego miasto. Do granicy dotrą za trzy i pół godziny. W tym czasie muszą podjąć decyzję, czy wysiąść, czy jechać dalej. Przed trudnym wyborem staje m.in. Marlis podróżująca z mężem Gerdem i dzieckiem.

programme.title: Military Wives
Pojedynek na głosy
Military Wives
programme.desc:
Military Wives: Directed by Peter Cattaneo. With Kristin Scott Thomas, Sharon Horgan, Emma Lowndes, Gaby French. With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8951692/","name":"Military Wives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWUxZGJkNjgtMDFjMC00ZTFiLTlmMGMtZGZmNWY4N2FlOWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MzE4MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8951692/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"iamkeysersoze-13228"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not perfect but still worth watching","reviewBody":"Military Wives is as formulaic as movies go, regardless the film is surprisingly good and it uses the formula really well. However it never aspires to be anything else preventing it from becoming a classic amongst the genre.

I haven't been familiar with the true story but from the start, you just know where it is all gonna go. It still works well but nothing is a surprise because of that. It still has some great moments and a fair amount of heart

It is seriously enjoyable and it is a likeable movie with a great cast. Kristen Scott Thomas and Sharon Horgan are great here. I'm sure there are many people who will like this film. I just can't see that much greatness in it. It's formulaic and does it's best to be a lovely and charming film but it does it in such a manipulative way, and I hate it when films do that. It is still worth watching though"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4325,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-03-06","keywords":"friendship,singing,bus,drinking,bar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4201561881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRkODczMzQtNDJjZS00ZjU0LTk3NTctZDMwNmM2MzViMTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRkODczMzQtNDJjZS00ZjU0LTk3NTctZDMwNmM2MzViMTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000218/","name":"Kristin Scott Thomas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1279721/","name":"Sharon Horgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1266378/","name":"Emma Lowndes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146341/","name":"Peter Cattaneo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0407896/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2074041/","name":"Rachel Tunnard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1598473/","name":"Rosanne Flynn"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 8951692, Title: Military Wives, --- Description: Military Wives: Directed by Peter Cattaneo. With Kristin Scott Thomas, Sharon Horgan, Emma Lowndes, Gaby French. With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8951692/","name":"Military Wives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWUxZGJkNjgtMDFjMC00ZTFiLTlmMGMtZGZmNWY4N2FlOWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MzE4MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8951692/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"iamkeysersoze-13228","dateCreated":"2020-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not perfect but still worth watching","reviewBody":"Military Wives is as formulaic as movies go, regardless the film is surprisingly good and it uses the formula really well. However it never aspires to be anything else preventing it from becoming a classic amongst the genre.

I haven't been familiar with the true story but from the start, you just know where it is all gonna go. It still works well but nothing is a surprise because of that. It still has some great moments and a fair amount of heart

It is seriously enjoyable and it is a likeable movie with a great cast. Kristen Scott Thomas and Sharon Horgan are great here. I'm sure there are many people who will like this film. I just can't see that much greatness in it. It's formulaic and does it's best to be a lovely and charming film but it does it in such a manipulative way, and I hate it when films do that. programme.title: La daronne
La daronne
programme.desc: La daronne: Directed by Jean-Paul Salomé. With Isabelle Huppert, Hippolyte Girardot, Farida Ouchani, Liliane Rovère. A translator working for the police gets involved in the other side of drug dealing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9288726/","name":"La daronne","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxYjNiOGYtZDNiOC00OWY2LTkxNjQtY2VhODYzNDk5ZjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDU0NjMyNTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A translator working for the police gets involved in the other side of drug dealing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9288726/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Getting it","reviewBody":"Isabelle Huppert - just the name alone should be enough for some to not even think twice about how they will feel about this movie. And she is really getting it - well done. Now morally speaking there are things that will be going on, that not everyone will agree with. Maybe that is the wrong way of putting it. But you'll know what I mean when you see the movie (or even the trailer I assume).\n\nThe movie is very well thought of and is quite the entertaining ride - while the subject matter is serious and there are certain scenes that are on the violent side - overall the tone is that of a comedy. Acting overall is top notch, there are certain things that may feel like an easy way out (problems that almost literally disappear to a degree) ... and the ending is something that while nice, is nothing that is as amazing or gives the movie an extra push ... but maybe that is nitpicking. Just enjoy the thriller ride with a lot of laughs (and still some social message hidden in there)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1950,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-09","keywords":"female translator,female drug dealer,retirement home,wind turbine,police","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2064367385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTFlNjk4ZDAtMjRiNC00M2Q4LTk3MzktNDM4N2Q5MmRjYTE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTFlNjk4ZDAtMjRiNC00M2Q4LTk3MzktNDM4N2Q5MmRjYTE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320762/","name":"Hippolyte Girardot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1560551/","name":"Farida Ouchani"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758933/","name":"Jean-Paul Salomé"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056792/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0690980/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0230609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1163751/","name":"Hannelore Cayre"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758933/","name":"Jean-Paul Salomé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3854210/","name":"Antoine Salomé"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

On the cusp of fatherhood, a junior mechanic aboard an interstellar ark to New Earth must outwit a malevolent cosmic terror intent on using the spaceship as a weapon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9820556/","name":"Breach","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk1Y2IyYzAtZGVkNC00Y2U3LWE0MWQtN2E3MTE1OTBjN2QyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"On the cusp of fatherhood, a junior mechanic aboard an interstellar ark to New Earth must outwit a malevolent cosmic terror intent on using the spaceship as a weapon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9820556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"noisyboy2012"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"its just bad.. i feel bad for Bruce too.","reviewBody":"Where to start... well you can tell right from the start it s low budget affair. the lack of polish is obvious everywhere. Bruce Willis keeps dinking his special moonshine from a flask.i don't blame him. by the end of this i wanted whatever he was drinking... its just bad. it get weirder and weirder by the end. and what is up with movies like this and dumbest ending. without any spoilers. if you wanted to see this for Bruce. just don't bother!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16155,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-12-17","keywords":"spaceship,virus,impostor,mutation,flamethrower","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4041130265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QyYWE3MGUtZWRjMC00NWUyLTg3NGEtOWIwNGQ3ZTM0NTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QyYWE3MGUtZWRjMC00NWUyLTg3NGEtOWIwNGQ3ZTM0NTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Fleeing a devastating plague on Earth, an interstellar ark comes under attack from a new threat; a shape-shifting alien force intent on slaughtering what is left of humanity."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4181215/","name":"Cody Kearsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629697/","name":"Rachel Nichols"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2986811/","name":"John Suits"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0554413/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0629377/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261920/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4864836/","name":"Edward Drake"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1143429/","name":"Corey Large"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jestem REN
Jestem REN
programme.desc: Jestem REN: Directed by Patricia Ryczko. With Marta Król, Marcin Sztabinski, Marieta Zukowska, Janusz Chabior. We meet a mother quietly obsessing over the sudden change in her family's life. Gradually we learn she is an android, and has suffered a glitch. The company puts her into therapy in order to assess the damage. She comes to see that her android self is her own fantasy. She begins to cooperate with the therapy, realizing she will be able to return to her family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11067160/","name":"Jestem REN","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTFiNDYxZDQtYzZjOC00NmU5LTllYjEtZjc4MWFhZGRhZTllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzUwOTc4NjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet a mother quietly obsessing over the sudden change in her family's life. Gradually we learn she is an android, and has suffered a glitch. The company puts her into therapy in order to assess the damage. She comes to see that h","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11067160/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fxflinn"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thought provoking parable of mental illness","reviewBody":"Caught this at the Boston Science Fiction Film Festival in Feb 2020. It's a tidy, well made film that draws you into a family battling the mental illness of the mother, who believes she is a sentient android who has malfunctioned. But maybe she is a human who has constructed an elaborate backstory to hide from the pain of being a person who cannot love and who cannot stop beating her on-the-cusp of manhood son. The material clues suggest we are in our time, not some future echoing the television series "Humans," but we are looking at the world through the eyes of the narrator, the mother, and she sees clues about her android origin everywhere. By the time the movie reaches its conclusion, you've been drawn into the madness, the uncertainty of what is human, what is programming, and profound discomfort for the mom and her interior life. The dedication at the end of the film makes it clear the filmmaker wanted to share his experience with his mother and her struggle. He succeeded. The intimate cinematography is a case study in how closeups and lighting can draw an audience into the interior life of the characters. The actors all do a fine job, particularly Marta Krol in the role of the mother and Marieta Zukowska as her peer, counterpart, alter ego or therapist -- when you are in psychosis, those around you play many roles.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":72,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-03-27","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2067989/","name":"Marta Król"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2029225/","name":"Marcin Sztabinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2346424/","name":"Marieta Zukowska"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2253296/","name":"Patricia Ryczko"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0734708/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0767135/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0778711/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2253296/","name":"Patricia Ryczko"}],"duration":"PT1H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Niepospolita
programme.desc: Rok 1939. Pisarz Tadeusz Dołęga-Mostowicz (Patryk Szwichtenberg) podróżuje po Polsce ze swoją asystentką Dianą (Agata Różycka). Przeprowadza wywiady z ludźmi, którzy osiągnęli sukces w różnych dziedzinach. Na swojej drodze spotyka m.in. Melchiora Wańkowicza (Marek Karpowicz), Janusza Kusocińskiego, Eugeniusza Kwiatkowskiego i Hankę Ordonównę.

programme.title: Knives Out
Prawda
La vérité
programme.desc: Knives Out: Directed by Rian Johnson. With Daniel Craig, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas, Jamie Lee Curtis. A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8946378/","name":"Knives Out","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGUwZjliMTAtNzAxZi00MWNiLWE2NzgtZGUxMGQxZjhhNDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU1NzU3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8946378/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pere-25366"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bringing back the classic whoddunit in amazingly entertaining fashion - 8/10 ⭐","reviewBody":"What an excellent film by Rian Johnson; definitely feels like the film he was destined to make. Writing that is slick as hell, sublime performances (most notably Daniel Craig who brings his A-game in a wonderfully charismatic turn), superb editing and wonderfully atmospheric music - all tied together by masterful direction. Will probably be among the most fun you have at a theatre this year and fans of Agatha Christie and old murder mystery stories will have plenty to love here - a nostalgically entertaining time!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":523526,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-27","keywords":"private detective,vomiting,whodunit,suspected suicide,murder mystery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2464857881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI3ODkzOTUtNzJjNS00ODhkLThkMzMtZjM4NjViZTYxNGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI3ODkzOTUtNzJjNS00ODhkLThkMzMtZjM4NjViZTYxNGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey (Christopher Plummer) is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc (Daniel Craig) is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185819/","name":"Daniel Craig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0262635/","name":"Chris Evans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1869101/","name":"Ana de Armas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0426059/","name":"Rian Johnson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0194736/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0762940/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0426059/","name":"Rian Johnson"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
Mój kuzyn Vinny
My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc:
My Cousin Vinny: Directed by Jonathan Lynn. With Joe Pesci, Ralph Macchio, Marisa Tomei, Mitchell Whitfield. Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0104952/","name":"My Cousin Vinny","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNDYzMTg1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk4MDgxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0104952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Barky44"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant Film!","reviewBody":"My Cousin Vinny is one of the most brilliant comedies ever produced. There is simply so much to love about this movie.

First, this is not simply a slapstick comedy. Sure, there is some of that, including a few hilarious moments in the Alabama mud. But the dialogue in this film is terrifically funny. The writers were able to turn a courtroom script into an incredibly funny exchange of dialogue between lawyers, judges and witnesses. And the whole idea of an out-of-work hairdresser knowing about Positraction is simply brilliant.

This dialogue is brilliant because of excellent performances by both Marisa Tomei and Joe Pesci. These two sell this whole load of nonsense so beautifully it should be mandatory viewing for first-year drama students. These two actors show how talented people can read practically anything and make it not only funny but wholly believable.

Even all the side characters, from the judge to the D.A. to the defendants to the jury and witnesses are brilliantly played. Some of the exchanges between a local Alabama judge and a NYC poser lawyer would be completely ridiculous in anyone else's hands, but these people make it so real and so funny it's truly a thing of beauty.

This is one of those rare films that I can watch over and over again for hours and not tire of it.

10 out of 10 Barky","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114262,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1992-03-13","keywords":"lawyer,trial,italian american,alabama,jail","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"My Cousin Vinny","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2744844569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000582/","name":"Joe Pesci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000673/","name":"Marisa Tomei"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001494/","name":"Ralph Macchio"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528718/","name":"Jonathan Lynn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057987/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490958/","name":"Dale Launer"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ashes in the Snow
Szare śniegi Syberii
Ashes in the Snow
programme.desc: Ashes in the Snow: Directed by Marius A. Markevicius. With Bel Powley, Lisa Loven Kongsli, Martin Wallström, Jonah Hauer-King. In 1941, a 16-year-old aspiring artist and her family are deported to Siberia amidst Stalin's brutal dismantling of the Baltic region. One girl's passion for art and her never-ending hope will break the silence of history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3759298/","name":"Ashes in the Snow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFjYmJlZmMtZDQxZC00MDZjLTkzNzMtNTIwNzU5NGY5NzIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjkzODg0Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1941, a 16-year-old aspiring artist and her family are deported to Siberia amidst Stalin's brutal dismantling of the Baltic region. One girl's passion for art and her never-ending hope will break the silence of history.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3759298/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kairaa"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"RECOMMEND! Glad this film was made","reviewBody":"It's really important to understand the atrocities and oppression of the Russian government over Eastern Europeans. This film takes place during World War II but even under the Tsar/Czar in the late 1800's and early 1900's, Russia was trying to erase Lithuanian and other conquered cultures with such things as Banning the local language and books.\n\nThis film shows us that the Russians were not much better than the Nazis when it came to concentration/labor camps. Without spoilers, it's heartbreaking and horrible what they did to millions of people from the 1930s to the 1950s. I have Lithuanian family who were deported to Siberia and not released for 15 years! Watching this you will understand what they say and so many went through."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-12","keywords":"communism,deportation,soviet union,political repression,rape attempt","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ashes in the Snow","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi372423193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGMzMjQ4YzMtNzI1OC00NzdhLTk1MWMtOWVlMDYwZDNiMjExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGMzMjQ4YzMtNzI1OC00NzdhLTk1MWMtOWVlMDYwZDNiMjExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2525790/","name":"Bel Powley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2966840/","name":"Lisa Loven Kongsli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909412/","name":"Martin Wallström"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2101256/","name":"Marius A.
